name: Mercado Collection | Medronho & Citrino
description:
Mercado Collection

Welcome to the market. “Mercado”, in portuguese, is a wood bench eco collection made from large wooden pallets, interely handmade seat with a special treatment, painted and varnished. The bench was built on the fusion of artisan´s restoration and product design and recovery.

A hand crafted wood plaque is applied in the bench legs with Varas Verdes brand to distinguish the product. 

Our mission is to understand the past and interpret the future using contemporary design, allowing and transform several pieces into a sustainable and timeless objects.
